scripts.deploy: npm run predeploy && npm run push-deploy
scripts.predeploy: git push origin --delete gh-pages && git branch -D gh-pages || echo 'Local gh-pages branch does not exist'
scripts.push-deploy: git checkout -b gh-pages rewrite/centralTaskStorage && git add dist -f && git commit -m "Deploy build output" && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages && git checkout rewrite/centralTaskStorage && git branch -D gh-pages
